item.description:
Join Families from across New England as we converge to Central Connecticut for a fun day in the sun. We will host our event at the 200 Acre Holiday Hill Resort Complex. All day activities include Basketball, Swimming, Football, Softball, Kayaking, Miniature Golf, Spades Tournament, UNO, Dominoes, Networking Mixer, Sin......gles Mixer, and much more. Facepainting, Arcade, and Games for the kids. This is a Family event for all to take part. All Day Buffet Included featuring Hot Dogs, Hamburgers, Pasta, Fruit, Donuts, Salads, Chicken, Corn, Bake Bean, Potato Salad, Ice Cream and much more!

Early Bird Tickets are $60 Adults & $35 3-11yrs. Kids under 3 are FREE.

Purchase Tickets Online http://www.theupn.org... or Click Here

Early Bird Tickets are limited, if you are interested in discount rate you must purchase by August 1st.

For information or tickets questions contact 203.444.2509

Adults who purchase tickets will have FREE VIP Admission to the Official AfterParty hosted by Jason V. Watts. Details of Venue to come soon.
item.name: The UPN & BlackinCT.com Family & Friends Day Mixer at Holiday Hill Resort
